title: How to Become a Temu Influencer & Earn Free Cash

steps.title: The Temu influencer program lets you earn money by promoting Temu.
steps.content: The Temu influencer program lets you earn money by promoting Temu. The Temu influencer program is a part of the site’s larger affiliate program . Temu influencers earn store credit, coupons, and commission by promoting Temu and its products across various social media sites, like TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube. The amount influencers earn is based on the amount of followers they have, how often they post, and the quality of their content. [1] X Research source Unlike other influencer programs, you do not have to have a certain number of followers to participate in the program. As of 2024, Temu is combining its influencer and affiliate programs, so the influencer program looks a bit different than it did in the past. However, the benefits are still there. Influencers can earn up to $1000 worth of free products and $500 in influencer cash bimonthly, as well as up to $100,000 in affiliate cash each month.

steps.title: Download the Temu app and make an account.
steps.content: Download the Temu app and make an account. Temu requires you to have an existing account before you can sign up for the influencer program. If you haven’t already, download the app or visit Temu’s website to create an account with a valid email address and password. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Search “influencer program” and click “Join the program.”
steps.content: Search “influencer program” and click “Join the program.” Once you’ve created your account, type “influencer program” into the search bar to pull up the influencer program page . Here you can read about the program’s benefits and frequently asked questions. When you’re ready to apply, click “Join the program” at the top of the page. [3] X Research source Googling “Temu influencer program” will also pull up the correct page. If you’re on desktop, the page will show a QR code you can scan to sign up from your phone.

steps.title: Explore your influencer and affiliate dashboard.
steps.content: Explore your influencer and affiliate dashboard. As of 2024, Temu is merging their influencer and affiliate programs into one, so as soon as you click “Join the program,” the site will redirect you to your affiliate homepage. Here you can see how much cash you have on your account and different ways you can earn rewards like coupons, commission, and free gifts. [4] X Research source You do not have to fill out any additional information to receive access to this page as long as you’re signed into your existing Temu account.

steps.title: Authorize your affiliate type.
steps.content: Authorize your affiliate type. To receive additional benefits, authorize which social media platforms you’ll be using to promote Temu. To do this, click on your account name under “Affiliate & influencer program.” In the pop-up, fill out your email address and phone number, or click the “Authorize” button to pull up a list of social media sites including YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram. Choose your preferred platform, then click “Authorize” again to log into your social media account. Temu will then review your account to determine how much credit you receive. [5] X Research source Authorizing a social media account can earn you up to $300 credit. You do not have to have a certain amount of followers to qualify for authorization, but the amount you have determines the amount of credit you receive. For example, someone with less than 500 Instagram followers is eligible for $15-30 credit, while someone with 50,000 is eligible for $30-60. To be eligible, you must have at least 500 views on posts or videos on your chosen platform within the last 90 days, and you must have published content within the last 30 days.

steps.title: Start sharing links to earn benefits.
steps.content: Start sharing links to earn benefits. While you wait for your social media account to be authorized, it’s still possible to start earning money. On your affiliate homepage, copy and paste the various affiliate links provided when promoting Temu. When new users sign up or purchase items using your referral links, you’ll earn things like 20% commission and $5 download rewards. Once your influencer account has been authorized, you’ll receive more opportunities to make money by joining campaigns with specific posting requirements. Be sure to follow the exact instructions provided by Temu to receive your rewards. [6] X Research source Once you’ve made at least $20 in Temu credit, it’s possible to withdraw the money and deposit it into your PayPal or bank account. Additionally, invite other affiliates to join the program and earn up to $55 for each affiliate who joins. The exact amount depends on how many followers they have and if they’ve earned a commission in the Temu affiliate program.

steps.title: Temu influencers can earn cash and gifts through the program.
steps.content: Temu influencers can earn cash and gifts through the program. While the exact benefits you get depends on how often you promote Temu and how well the content does, the company offers its influencers a ton of great benefits for participating in the program. Here are some of the main benefits you can receive as a Temu influencer: [7] X Research source $300 balance upon approval Up to 20% commission on sales Up to $300 worth of free products Exclusive discounts to share with your audience and friends Up to $1000 in seeding balance monthly Up to $100,000 affiliate cash monthly Up to $500 influencer cash bimonthly Access to early sales and promotions The opportunity to grow your platform through your collaboration with Temu

steps.title: Temu doesn’t explicitly state any eligibility requirements.
steps.content: Temu doesn’t explicitly state any eligibility requirements. Anyone can sign up for the influencer program, but that doesn’t necessarily mean you’ll get approved. Temu reviews each application individually to determine who would be the best fit for their program. They typically seek influencers with the following: [8] X Research source A decent following on a social media platform like TikTok, Instagram, or YouTube At least 500 views on videos over the last 90 days An engaged audience and high quality content Some sources state you must be at least 18 years old and a legal resident of the country you live in. However, this information is not easily found on Temu’s website.

steps.title: You must follow Temu’s rules to remain in the program.
steps.content: You must follow Temu’s rules to remain in the program. Once you start promoting Temu and its products, different campaigns will have certain requirements for how the products should be promoted in your content. [9] X Research source If you don’t follow these requirements, Temu may count it as an account violation. If you receive too many violations, you may be removed from the program.

steps.title: Authorize your social media account with the most followers.
steps.content: Authorize your social media account with the most followers. While Temu doesn’t require its influencers to have a certain number of social media followers, having a large following is definitely beneficial as it increases your chances of getting approved and allows you to earn more money. If you make content across various social media sites, authorize the one that has the most followers and the most engagement to increase your chances of getting approved. [10] X Research source Once you’ve been approved, Temu allows you to add secondary social media sites for additional opportunities to earn benefits.

steps.title: Post high-quality content regularly.
steps.content: Post high-quality content regularly. To be eligible for the influencer program, Temu requires you to have posted content within the last 30 days prior to applying for the program. However, the more you post, the better your chances of getting selected. Create a regular posting schedule and post engaging content that your followers are likely to interact with. The more views you have, the more likely you’ll get approved. [11] X Research source For example, if your main platform is YouTube, try posting new videos on a certain day each week. Or, try posting on Instagram daily. Don’t post content just for the sake of posting content. Make sure it’s something you’re proud of and passionate about.

steps.title: Post content that Temu’s customers would enjoy.
steps.content: Post content that Temu’s customers would enjoy. While it’s important to be true to yourself and post content that reflects your interests, keep in mind that Temu is a business. Because they sell a lot of clothing, makeup, and household items, they’re more likely to select influencers who cater to an audience who is likely to buy these things. You may have a better chance of getting approved if you’re a lifestyle, fashion, or beauty blogger. [12] X Research source For example, if you only post content about books, it would feel out of place to suddenly promote Temu’s beauty products. This doesn’t mean it’s impossible to become a Temu influencer if you post other content. However, if you regularly post about how to fix cars, for example, and are suddenly reviewing women’s fashion, your audience might not engage. In this case, you probably wouldn’t earn as much money as a creator who regularly posts fashion hauls.

steps.title: Engage with your followers.
steps.content: Engage with your followers. To join the influencer program, Temu requires a minimum of 500 views on posts over the last 90 days. To get your followers to interact with your content, engage with them by replying to their comments, asking what content they’d like to see, and even hosting giveaways. This allows your followers to build a more personal connection with you, and in turn, they’re more likely to use any referral links you share. [13] X Research source

steps.title: Influencers must meet certain requirements to get paid.
steps.content: Influencers must meet certain requirements to get paid. Temu pays influencers based on the size of their audience and how well their content does. As influencers continue to promote Temu, they have the opportunity to move up to a new “level,” which offers more benefits and higher payments. In general, here’s how Temu pays its influencers: [14] X Research source Influencers with a primary social media account must meet the requirements for valid posts and commissions within each calculation cycle to receive payment. Influencers with a secondary social media account must post at least 15 valid posts each calculation cycle to get paid. Temu pays influencers based on their level—the higher the level, the better the rewards. Temu offers additional rewards to influencers who refer other influencers to the program.

steps.title: How much will I earn as a Temu influencer?
steps.content: How much will I earn as a Temu influencer? The exact amount you earn depends on how much content you create and how well it performs. The more you promote Temu, the more rewards you earn. Influencers can earn up to $300 just for having their Temu account approved, then up to $100,000 in affiliate cash each month. Additionally, earn up to a $1000 balance and up to $500 in cash bimonthly. [15] X Research source

steps.title: Is the Temu influencer program legit?
steps.content: Is the Temu influencer program legit? The Temu influencer program is legitimate, though it may be difficult to earn a decent amount of money depending on your social media following and how much you post. Unlike many other influencer programs, Temu allows you to withdraw the money you earn and transfer it to other accounts rather than using it solely as store credit. [16] X Research source Most of the money you earn as an influencer is based on referral links, so if not many people sign up or buy from your links, you won’t earn as much money. You have to have a balance of at least $20 to withdraw your cash.

steps.title: How many followers do I need to join the influencer program?
steps.content: How many followers do I need to join the influencer program? You do not need a certain number of followers to join the influencer program. Temu cares more about how much interaction your content receives. However, the amount of followers you have does influence how much money you earn, and Temu may be more likely to accept your application if you have a lot of followers. When you sign up for the program, Temu will show you a list of different social media platforms and how much you can earn based on the number of followers you have. [17] X Research source Temu reviews each application individually, so they reserve the right to decline your application. If this happens, you can still earn money through the affiliate program by sharing referral links. You just won’t have access to certain campaigns and promotions.

steps.title: Are Temu’s influencer program and affiliate program the same thing?
steps.content: Are Temu’s influencer program and affiliate program the same thing? As of 2024, Temu is merging their influencer and affiliate programs into one. The affiliate program is the overarching program that anyone can earn money from, and the influencer program is a program within the affiliate program that provides additional opportunities to earn money based on social media content creation. [18] X Research source In the past, anyone could join the affiliate program to earn money through referral links, while the influencer program was reserved for users who had a certain number of social media followers. The affiliate program also offers opportunities for website and organization affiliates.

steps.title: Do I have to pay an application fee to join the program?
steps.content: Do I have to pay an application fee to join the program? No, signing up for and participating in Temu’s influencer program is entirely free. Temu does not require an application fee or a minimum sales quota for any members. Influencers earn cash, coupons, and free items , while Temu gains new business through the influencers’ promotion, so both parties benefit. [19] X Research source
